title: Cross-Facility Staffing Allocation Model

decision_options.name: Cross-facility allocation model with minimum reserve
decision_options.tradeoff: Requires system-level staffing governance; limits facility autonomy
decision_options.success_metric: No facility below 90% of staffing minimum during reallocation

decision_options.name: Facility-level staffing independence (no shared pool)
decision_options.tradeoff: Higher baseline cost; each facility maintains full independent coverage

patch_sequence.action: Activate agency staffing for General night shift; restore Community L&D contracts
patch_sequence.verification: General med-surg ratio restored to 1:5; Community L&D above minimum
patch_sequence.rollback: Maintain agency contracts until permanent staff restored

patch_sequence.action: Submit corrective action plan to state regulatory body within 24 hours
patch_sequence.verification: State acknowledgment of corrective action plan received
patch_sequence.rollback: Escalate to legal counsel if state requires additional action

patch_sequence.action: Implement cross-facility staffing allocation model with 10% reserve floor
